court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Pinellas County; Cynthia J. Newton and J. Thomas McGrady, Judges.
opinion.attorneys:
James Marion Moorman, Public Defender, and Richard P. Albertine, Jr., Assistant Public Defender, Bartow, for Appellant.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Sonya Roebuck Horbelt, Assistant Attorney General, Tampa, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
CASANUEVA, C.J., and SILBERMAN and WALLACE, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINED.
